item.description: Please join us on Thursday night September 17th for a Scrapbook Class held at the Saddle Rock Apartment Complex Clubhouse. Each participant will have ample table space to work on their layout. Participate in the class project or come and do your own thing! Memory Works products will be available and catalog orders will be accepted! There will be a tool table available for use during the class (Cricut, Crop-a-dile, Corner Chomper etc.). Please RSVP to Jodi at jocahill@optonline.net or call 631-379-8028! The more the merrier, bring a friend! A $10.00 fee per person covers the cost for the materials provided to complete the project taught. RSVP today!
item.name: Scrapbook Classes September Meetup
